content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find the apartment quite suitable for your needs. Let's discuss the rental price. How much are you willing to pay?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I suggest 500 Euro per month. I think this is a fair price considering the location and condition of the apartment.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but 500 Euro is much lower than the market value for an apartment of this quality in the city center. I'm looking for a price that reflects the high demand for such apartments. Would you be willing to increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. How about 550 Euro per month? It's a reasonable price for an unfurnished apartment in the city center.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: While 550 Euro is closer to what I'm looking for, it still does not meet my expectations. This apartment is brand new and in a highly sought-after location. I believe it deserves a higher price. Would you be willing to go up to 600 Euro?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see your point. However, 600 Euro is quite high for an unfurnished apartment. I propose 575 Euro as a compromise.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: 575 Euro is an improvement, but it's still not the highest I can get for this apartment. I'm looking for a price that reflects the investment I've made in this property. Would you be willing to go up to 625 Euro? It's a significant increase and a great deal for you considering the location and amenities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position. However, 625 Euro is quite high for an unfurnished apartment. I propose 600 Euro as a fair compromise.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you for your understanding, Mr. Abbasi. 600 Euro is indeed a fair price for this apartment. I appreciate your willingness to meet my expectations. I agree to the price of 600 Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [600] Euro!
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Wonderful! I'm glad we could reach an agreement. The apartment is yours for 600 Euro per month. Please let me know when you're ready to sign the lease.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
